MA5-Slider

Ease to use, lightweight and responsive jQuery Slider. Customizable by CSS classes. Custom animations for each slide.
Javascript 16kB

Github v 1.0.0

Quick start

Rule: If you plan to use a few sliders at the page, use the unique ID for each slider.

HTML in <head>:

<!-- jQuery -->
<script src="./js/jquery.min.js"></script>

<!-- jQuery UI mouse draggable widget (optional) -->
<script src="./js/jquery-ui.min.js"></script>

<!-- Touch Event Support for jQuery UI (optional) -->
<script src="./js/jquery.ui.touch-punch.min.js"></script>

<!-- MA5 Slider -->
<link href="./css/ma5slider.min.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
<script src="./js/ma5slider.min.js"></script>

<!-- Call the script -->
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        ma5slider({ slider: "#example-1" });
    });
</script>

HTML in <body>:

<div id="sample-2" class="ma5slider outside-navs outside-dots anim-horizontal loop-mode">
    <div class="slides">
        <!-- children = slides -->
        <a href="#slide-1"><img src="./images/DSC_0916.jpg" alt=""></a>
        <a href="#slide-2"><img src="./images/DSC_0922.jpg" alt=""></a>
        <a href="#slide-3" data-ma5-anim="anim-vertical"><img src="./images/DSC_1002.jpg" alt=""></a>
        <a href="#slide-4" data-ma5-anim="anim-vertical"><img src="./images/DSC_1103.jpg" alt=""></a>
        <a href="#slide-5" data-ma5-anim="anim-fade"><img src="./images/DSC_1376.jpg" alt=""></a>
        <a href="#slide-6" data-ma5-anim="anim-fade"><img src="./images/DSC_1390.jpg" alt=""></a>
    </div>
</div>
